songs.title: Praise The Lord
songs.lyrics: Br/[Intro:]br/Brothers and sisters!br/We gonna have Church tonight! br/And tonight this speaker is, Reverend Ruffus Jackson..br/br/[Chorus:]Insert non-formatted text herebr/I wake up praising, God every day, br/I wanna....smoke some weed and roll me the J,br/Thankya Jesus! (Thankyou Jesus!)br/Thankya Lord! (Thankyou Lord!)br/For lettin' me live another day! Hey! hey!br/br/[Verse 1:]br/Nigga I'm high, nigga you high. (uh huh)br/lets get high in the motherfucking sky!br/Watch the butterflies, hit the wall,br/and if you're feeling down, give yer boy a call!br/Weed, it takes the stress away,br/thats why Bizarre smokes ten blunts a day.br/It's nuffing but the sticky, icky, green stuff! br/Line it, pass it and take a puff! br/Having a bad day, stop by my house,br/coz most likely, I've got a blunt in my mouth.br/So sit down relax and chill, br/and if ya don't smoke weed, then shit, I got sum pills!br/Watch ya need girl, br/a fucking refill?br/a fat bag a weedbr/and sum happy meals?br/Nah, baby, I don't smoke no porks,br/only fat bags of weed in this escort.br/br/[Chorus:]br/I wake up praising, God every day, br/I wanna....smoke some weed and roll me the J,br/Thankya Jesus! [Thankyou Jesus!]br/Thankya Lord! [Thankyou Lord!]br/For lettin' me live another day! Hey! hey!br/br/[Verse 2:]br/Sunday morning, Bizarre have day,br/Blunt in my mouth, watching DJ Dre.br/Dangerous my, just like Cudiobr/Only church I know, a snoop dogg's studio.br/Wide out the raps, blowing in my lap,br/Rap hennesy, keep the acid tap.br/I'm glad, that I didn't't go down south,br/Take care of my kids, be the man of the house,br/orange mushrooms, and yellow stars,br/Fat bags of weed[???]br/Get in and lap, come on jump in,br/Raid a bottle of gin, and two of your freaky friendsbr/O fuck it! Let's go to see the point,br/Bring your son alone, shit, he can hit the joint,br/Cause rapping, it's a full time job!br/All I wanna smoke weed and praise God!br/br/[Chorus:]br/I wake up praising, God every day, br/I wanna....smoke some weed and roll me the J,br/Thankya Jesus! (Thankyou Jesus!)br/Thankya Lord! (Thankyou Lord!)br/For lettin' me live another day! Hey! hey!br/br/[Outro:]br/Break it down....yeabr/We gonna slow it down rite here...br/We havin' Church up in here tonight, it's the Reverend Rufuss Johnson...br/and we sittin' over here, br/at sixteen five-o, cone it[?]br/and ladies and gentlemen,br/come in, praise God with us..br/br/[over Chorus:]br/Baptist,br/Catholic,br/Jahova Witness,br/yea, come praise God,br/yea! services, send it,br/at 4-20,br/brothers and sisters send it at 4-20!br/come on, praise God.br/Just coz you smoke weed don't mean you a sinner! What!?br/br/[Bizarre: speaking]br/Just coz you smoke weed don't mean you don't believe in God!br/Jesus will keep care of ya! Jesus!br/You need Jesus!br/[coughing] br/
